author: cmpilato
msg: Strictly formatting changes in preparation of the Big Rewrite.

author: gstein
msg: Revamp the client's debugging commit editor to directly wrap another
editor rather than using editor composition. As a result, all the
get_test_editor rather than manually composing editors.
(struct item_baton): new baton for file/dir batons
(make_baton): take new params and return an item_baton now
(all test editor funcs): use new batons. invoke the "real" editor
functions. split out shared "item" editor funcs so we know which

author: blair
msg: The &usage subroutine prints a \n after printing its arguments, so
don't add a training \n to any strings passed to it.
